'''Carrots''' are a [[Cooking Ingredient]] found in the wild in [[Teyvat]].

==How to Obtain==

* Carrots grow in various locations of Teyvat, mainly in [[Mondstadt]], and most often grow alongside other Carrots and/or [[Radish]]es. They can also be dropped by destructible crates, barrels and pots as well as [[Investigation]] points. <ref>See the Video Guides section or the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=167 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations. </ref>
* Expeditions (Via Adventurer's Guild at Wolvendom and Guyun Stone Forest; minimum 4 hours, maximum 20 hours)
